title: Manson Family - The Bobby Beausoleil Files
description:
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
|*********************************************************************************|
+*********************************************************************************+ 
|*************************** Rare Manson Family Material *************************|
+*********************************************************************************+
|*********************************************************************************|  
+*********************************************************************************+
|                                                                                 |
+                            The Bobby Beausoleil Files                           +
|                                                                                 |
+*********************************************************************************+
|                                                                                 |
+                                                                                 +
| News clippings and documents from my own collection. May be updated in the      | 
+ future as I'm still researching and collecting data. This WinRAR zip package    +
| contains the following files:                                                   |
+                                                                                 +
| * Beausoleil Sentenced to Death (June 16, 1970) (entire newspaper page in PDF)  |
+ * John Gilmore Interview (2005) (PDF Document)                                  +
| * John Gilmore talks about Bobby (2005) (PDF Document)                          |
+ * Relationship between Gary Hinman & Bobby Beausoleil detailed (PDF document)   +
| * 6 Wounded in Feud at San Quentin - Los Angeles Times (April 25,1973)          | 
+ * 6 Wounded in Quentin Inmate Power Struggle - Oakland Tribune (April 1973)     +
| * Attorney Asks Acquittal for Defendant in Hinman Death (April 16, 1970)        |
+ * Beausoleil Asks New Trial In Cult Slaying (May 13, 1970)                      +
| * Beausoleil Details Links - Independent Press-Telegram (April 1970)            |
+ * Beausoleil Given Okay to Seek New Murder Trial - The Daily Report (May 1970)  +
| * Beausoleil Is Denied Right to Act as Own Attorney (May 14, 1970)              |
+ * Beausoleil Loses in Bid for New Trial (and related article) - The News (1970) +
| * Beausoleil Sentenced to Death for Torture-Killing of Hinman (April 20, 1970)  |
+ * Beausoleil to do sountrack Lucifer Rising from prison - Date unknown          +
| * Manson family disciple denied parole - Pacific Stars and Stripes (Dec. 1984)  |
+ * Jail Transient in Topagna Canyon Slaying of Man - Source unknown (1969)       +
| * Condemn Beausoleil to Die for Gary Hinman's Murder - The News (April 1970)    |
+ * Charges Against Cult 'Kin' Upheld (January 16, 1970)                          +
| * Court Told Manson Killed Musician - The San Mateo Times (April 14, 1970)      |
+ * Cyclist Tells Manson Case Deal With D.A. - Independent Press-Telegram (1970)  +
| * DA Tries Again in First 'Manson Family' Trial - Source unknown (1970)         |
+ * Defendant Claims Manson Stabbed, Killed Musician Gary Hinman - The News       +
| * Defendant in Hinman Case Will Seek 'New Evidence' - The News (May 28, 1970)   |
+ * Find Beausoleil Guilty of First Degree Murder - Independent Press-Telegram    +
| * Judge Refuses Transfer of Murder Trial - The News (January 25, 1970)          |
+ * Jury finds Manson pal guilty of Hinman murder - Lowell Sunday Sun (1970)      +
| * Jury Weighs Life, Death Penalty for Slayer of Hinman (April 17, 1970)         |
+ * LA Jury Asks Death Penalty For Beausoleil - The Fresno Bee (April 22, 1970)   +
| * Manson cohort seeks reversal - The Daily Review (July 27, 1973)               |
+ * Manson Cultist Faces Trial for Life - The Stars and Stripes (April 1, 1970)   +
| * Testifies Manson Ordered July Murder of Musician - The News (April 7, 1970)   |
+ * Manson family's Robert Beausoleil to defend self against death sentence       +
| * Manson Indicted in Slaying - Independent Press-Telegram (April 15, 1970)      |
+ * Manson Is Among 3 Indicted In Knife Murder Of Musician - The Modesto Bee      +
| * $20,000 Extortion Plot Failed - The Stars and Stripes (April 5, 1970)         |
+ * Manson Tie To Hinman's Autos Bared - Source unknown (1970)                    +
| * Mom Claims Cult Girl Lied - Independent Press-Telegram (June 1970)            |
+ * New 'Manson Cult' Murder Trial Opens - Source unknown (1970)                  +
+ * Panel Quizzed on Manson In Hinman Murder Retrial (and more) - The News (1970) +
| * Ex-Follower of Manson Loses Plea to Dismiss Murder Charge (Jan. 14, 1970)     |
+ * Postponement Seen For Manson Trial - The San Mateo Times (April 17, 1970)     +
| * Prison brawl traced to whites - The Daily Review (April 25, 1973)             |
+ * Refuses to Drop Murder Charge Linked to 'Family' + Evelle Younger article     +
| * Retrial Scheduled for Youth Linked to Tate Death Case - The News (Dec. 1969)  | 
+ * San Quentin cons battle for power - Independent Press-Telegram (April 1973)   +
| * Defendant in Hinman Case Will Seek 'New Evidence' - The News (May 28, 1970)   |
+ * Suspect Acccuses Manson - Winnipeg Free Press (April 15, 1970)                +
| * Suspect Says Manson Killed Bagpipe Player - The Fresno Bee (April 14, 1970)   |
+ * Testifies Manson Ordered July Murder of Musician (and more) - The News (1970) + 
| * Witness in Beausoleil Case Changes Her Story Again (and more) - The News      |  
+                                                                                 +
|                                                                                 |
+                                                                                 +
